attributes.action: Pay minimum wage to self-employed during Covid-19 outbreak
attributes.additional_details: It will ensure the large amount of people can self isolate and not add to the spread of the disease.
attributes.background: Treat the self employed, freelancers and people on zero hours contracts equally to the employed during the Covid-19 outbreak.

rejection.details:
The National Minimum Wage is an hourly rate of pay, not a minimum income.

Since you started your petition the Government has announced support for self-employed individuals: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/chancellor-gives-support-to-millions-of-self-employed-individuals

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
